description: A Frontend Developer passionate about crafting seamless user experiences and diving into the Backend to make them come alive. I enjoy building modern, scalable web applications using technologies like React, Next.js, and Spring Boot.
aboutMeSection: ey! I'm a software developer specializing in modern frontend development with a strong foundation in backend development and architecture. I build clear, scalable, and maintainable applications, prioritizing both user experience and code quality. I enjoy engaging with business logic, proposing improvements, and creating solutions that truly deliver value, not just meet requirements.
projectsInfoProjects: I'm currently organizing and documenting my projects. In the meantime, you can check out my professional experience or my GitHub.
weStillWorking: We are still working on this section :)
firstExperienceDescription: Developed REST APIs with Spring Boot for a project in the financial sector. Created dynamic components in React + TypeScript, consuming APIs with Axios. Worked as a team using SCRUM, participating in sprints, and implementing best practices.
secondExperienceDescription: Development of REST endpoints in Spring Boot 3 with Java 17, applying best practices and architectural standards. Implementation and maintenance of modules in a Java Web App system (Java 8, legacy) used for credit management. Support in the development of a mobile application using React Native CLI + TypeScript, including the generation of the deployment file for the Google Play Store. Integration of MySQL databases for data persistence. Participation in an agile team using the SCRUM methodology.
contactDescription: Shoot me an email if you want to connect! You can also find me on
